titleStmt.title: The Baptist and Independent Churches (so called) set on fire by a bright shining light revealed from heaven their pastors and teachers scorching in the flame of it, gnashing and blaspheming God in his temple ... / by ... Thomas Morford.
titleStmt.author: Morford, Thomas, d. 1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Wilson and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
